name: Inspiring Mentor
text: Others listen to your words of encouragement and perform acts above and beyond as a result.
benefit: Inspire competence now affects all allies within 30 feet who can hear your performance, as long as they are attempting the skill you’ve selected.
normal: Inspire competence only affects one ally.
text_zh: 你的表演能够让其他听众也做得更好。
prerequisites_zh: 魅力 13，提振技能（Inspire Competence）吟游表演。
benefit_zh: 提振技能（Inspire Competence）吟游表演（bardic performance）现在可以影响30尺内所有能够听到你的表演的盟友，只要他们尝试的技能是你选择的便可以生效。
normal_zh: 提振技能（Inspire Competence）仅能影响1名盟友。
